# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This item is truly a masterpiece, and we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you. Would you be interested in acquiring this product for $125? We're confident it will exceed your expectations and bring immense value to your life or business. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
